description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任内蒙古自治区革命委员会副主任，内蒙古自治区人大常委会副主任。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as the Vice Chairman of the Revolutionary Committee of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region and the Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省下辖的县级市，是李文的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city in Shandong Province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Li Wen.

description.zh-cn: 东亚的一个社会主义国家，通称中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

nodes.id: 内蒙古自治区革命委员会

zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区革命委员会
en: Revolutionary Committee of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间内蒙古自治区的权力机构。
description.en: The governing body of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region during the Cultural Revolution.

nodes.id: 内蒙古自治区人大常委会

zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区人大常委会
en: Standing Committee of the People's Congress of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region

description.zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing committee of the People's Congress of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.
Li Wen was born in Changyi, Shandong.

relationships.target: 内蒙古自治区革命委员会

description.zh-cn: 李文曾担任内蒙古自治区革命委员会副主任。
description.en: Li Wen served as the Vice Chairman of the Revolutionary Committee of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.

relationships.target: 内蒙古自治区人大常委会

description.zh-cn: 李文曾担任内蒙古自治区人大常委会副主任。
description.en: Li Wen served as the Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the People's Congress of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类信息，李文是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the page category information, Li Wen is a member of the Communist Party of China.
